description: Verify COLMAP installation and gsplat/pycolmap imports

patterns.test_pattern: pytest tests with simple import verification
patterns.verification_pattern: Try-except blocks with PASS/FAIL output, following test_imports_simple.py pattern
patterns.command_verification: Subprocess calls to verify COLMAP binary is accessible

existing_implementations.description: Existing import verification scripts test torch, gsplat, matplotlib, gss

verification_structure.import_tests: Try-except blocks that import and print success/failure
verification_structure.command_tests: Subprocess calls to check binary accessibility

verification_requirements.colmap_binary: colmap --version should execute and return version
verification_requirements.gsplat_import: python -c "import gsplat; from gsplat import rasterization; print('OK')" should succeed
verification_requirements.environment: conda gss environment must be activated
